description: Explore drawing a new design for an arrival point at East Croydon station as part of the Build/Play/Wear/Draw Croydon event. This is a fun and relaxed event – with the Croydon Urban Room team, you will draw your designs and ideas for what would improve your arrival at East Croydon Station and encourage you to travel into the centre of Croydon. This is a drop-in drawing activity for all ages.

factsheet.heading: Draw Your Croydon Arrival
paragraphs:
You will draw your ideas for a gateway at the East Croydon Station arrival, reflecting on what you like about the Croydon Town Centre and what would encourage you to walk there. 
 
You will be guided by the Urban Room team who are part of Croydon’s Placemaking team on how to design and draw your ideas. This is an event for everyone, and for all the family; you can join in to draw your ideas and imagination in a relaxed atmosphere, whether you’re a beginner or a pro!  
 
The Croydon Urban Room is a space to talk about the future of the North End Quarter and the wider town centre. Through conversations, stories, exhibitions and events, the Urban Room brings together the views of those who live, work and visit the area, to develop clear priorities for a plan to steer the town centre's recovery.
